1.speaker: RINRIN
1.character: お花 こちらでよろしいでしょうか

2.speaker: GIRL
2.character: は　はい　それでお願いします
2.definition: Y-Yes, please! That would be perfect.

3.speaker: RINRIN
3.character: またいらしてくださいね

7.speaker: RINRIN
7.character: バイトお疲れ　はい　これ
7.definition: You must be tired from working! Here, have these.

8.speaker: PANDA
8.character: まぁ もらっておくけど

10.speaker: RINRIN
10.character: パンダくん　つれないな
10.definition: Panda... You can be so heartless.

11.speaker: RINRIN
11.character: あ～　パンダくん 仲よくなりたいのに
11.definition: Oh, Panda. I just want to be friends with you.

12.speaker: PUPPET
12.character: 大丈夫　きっと仲よくなれるよ

16.speaker: RINRIN
16.character: はい　フローリスト リンリンです
16.definition: Yes, this is Florist Rin Rin.

17.speaker: RINRIN
17.character: 竹をメインにしたアレンジですか
17.definition: An arrangement with bamboo as the main piece?

19.character: で　お届けはどちらまで
19.definition: Where should I deliver it to?

20.speaker: PANDA
20.character: リンリンてさ　困った人だよね

23.speaker: PANDA
23.character: そう　僕が通りかかるたびにさ
23.definition: Yep. Every time I pass by...

26.speaker: RINRIN
26.character: パンダって　かわいいよね

27.speaker: PENGUIN
27.definition: Seems like a nice guy. Really? But the panda items he gives me are so tacky.

31.speaker: PENGUIN
31.character: じゃあ　笹子さんにあげれば
31.definition: Then why don't you give it to Miss Sasako?

33.speaker: PENGUIN
33.character: 気に入ってるじゃない

34.speaker: PANDA
34.character: リンリンて　ホント困った人だから

35.speaker: POLAR BEAR
35.character: 今頃パンダくんの家に行ってたりして
35.definition: What if he was at your house right now?

36.speaker: PANDA
36.definition: Don't say things like that. This is Panda's house.

37.speaker: RINRIN
37.character: お花をお届けにあがりました

39.character: この時間は　しろくまカフェかな
39.definition: He's probably at Polar Bear's Café at this hour.

40.speaker: PANDAMAMA
40.character: どうも　ご苦労様です
40.definition: Hello, thank you for your hard work.

42.speaker: RINRIN
42.character: パンダだ　パンダママだ

44.speaker: RINRIN
44.definition: Y-Yes. I'll pay this separately, but would you mind rearranging the bamboo in the rooms, too?

45.speaker: RINRIN
45.character: お家に 上がっていいんですか！
45.definition: You mean I can come into your house?!

46.speaker: PENGUIN
46.character: リンリンのパンダ好きは相当なものらしいよ
46.definition: It seems that Rin Rin has an intense love of pandas.

47.speaker: SASAKO
47.character: パンダグッズも かなり集めてるそうですよ
47.definition: Apparently his collection of panda merchandise is quite extensive.

48.speaker: PENGUIN
48.character: 花屋じゃなくて パンダグッズ屋やればよかったのに
48.definition: He should have opened up a panda merchandise shop instead of a flower shop.

51.speaker: POLAR BEAR
51.character: 若き日のリンリンが パンダグッズを集めるため　世界を旅していた頃
51.definition: When the young Rin Rin was traveling the world to collect panda merchandise,

52.speaker: POLAR BEAR
52.character: とある事件に巻き込まれ…
52.definition: he was involved in an incident...

56.speaker: POLAR BEAR
56.character: ささやかな嘘で あなたの味気ない日常に彩りを
56.definition: I want to bring some color into your desolate lives with a modest lie.

57.speaker: PENGUIN
57.character: 味気ない日常で悪かったね
57.definition: Well, excuse me for having a desolate life! Let's stop talking about Rin Rin.

60.speaker: PANDAMAMA
60.definition: Here, I'll pay you right now.

62.speaker: RINRIN
62.character: ここでパンダくんが 暮らしているんだな

65.speaker: PANDASISTER
65.character: ママがお茶どうぞって
65.definition: Mama asked me to bring you some tea.

66.speaker: RINRIN
66.character: パンダだ　パンダ妹だ
66.definition: It's a panda! Little Sister Panda!

68.speaker: RINRIN
68.character: ありがとう…　えっと…

70.speaker: MEIMEI
70.character: あなた　リンリンでしょ？

71.speaker: RINRIN
71.character: 僕のこと　知ってるんだ？

72.speaker: MEIMEI
72.character: イケメン花屋って街じゃ有名よ
72.definition: You're famous around town as the good-looking florist.

74.speaker: MEIMEI
74.definition: You're not very humble, are you?

75.speaker: MEIMEI
75.character: でも…　私の好みじゃないわね
75.definition: But you know, you're not my type.

77.speaker: MEIMEI
77.character: まあ　いいわ ちょっと遊んであげる
77.definition: Oh well, I'll play with you for a little while.

79.speaker: RINRIN
79.character: ああ　ごめん お店があるから　帰らないと
79.definition: Oh, sorry, I actually need to get back to my shop...

80.speaker: PANDAMAMA
80.character: リンリンさん　お待たせ
80.definition: Sorry to keep you waiting, Mr. Rin Rin.

84.speaker: RINRIN
84.definition: I'm rolling around with a panda!

85.speaker: RINRIN
85.character: なんて幸せな時間なんだ…
85.definition: What an amazingly happy time! Next we're going to play hide and seek. Playing hide and seek with a panda!

87.speaker: PANDAMAMA
87.character: リンリンさん案外タフね
87.definition: Mr. Rin Rin is quite tough.

88.speaker: RINRIN
88.character: リンリンさん案外タフね
88.definition: {\a6}three... four... five... Hey, where are you? Hey! I wonder if it's okay to keep playing and not go back to work.

89.speaker: RINRIN
89.definition: It is! Because I'm with pandas!

93.speaker: MEIMEI
93.character: あっ　お爺ちゃん 何やってるの？
93.definition: Oh, Grandpa, what are you doing?

95.speaker: MEIMEI
95.character: 違うわよ　リンリンは　お花屋さんよ
95.definition: No, Rin Rin is a florist.

96.speaker: GRANDPA
96.character: ニチニチ　コレコー　ニチ…
96.definition: Every day is a good day.

97.speaker: GRANDPA
97.character: ジョージョー　シャクリョー　セーコー　トーテー…
97.definition: Consider the whole. {\a6}High pressure west, low pressure east.

98.speaker: MEIMEI
98.character: 都合が悪くなると すぐとぼけるんだから
98.definition: You always play dumb when things go wrong. {\a6}A good and wise mother.

101.speaker: RINRIN
101.character: パンダお爺ちゃんの太極拳…　だ…

102.speaker: POLAR BEAR
102.definition: So, it wasn't a panda merchandise store...

103.speaker: POLAR BEAR
103.character: 花屋を営むこととなりました
103.definition: but a flower shop that he started.

104.speaker: PENGUIN
104.definition: It's so sad. I know it's made up, but I still can't stop crying.

105.speaker: PANDA
105.character: 思わず　リンリンに 優しくしちゃいそうだよ
105.definition: I may feel like being nice to Rin Rin.

107.speaker: POLAR BEAR
107.character: それはあの眩しくも世知辛い国でのことだった
107.definition: It was there in that glaring, cruel land...

108.speaker: PENGUIN
108.character: いや　さすがに　もういい
108.definition: No, that's enough already. Huh? Where am I?

109.speaker: RINRIN
109.character: イテテ…　あっ　そうか

110.character: パンダくんちに配達に来て　それで…
110.definition: I came to deliver flowers to Panda's house and...

111.speaker: RINRIN
111.character: まいったな… 早く店に帰らなきゃ
111.definition: This isn't good. I have to hurry and get back to the shop.

112.speaker: RINRIN
112.character: こ…　これは　パンダくんの…

113.speaker: RINRIN
113.character: もしかして　この部屋は…

115.speaker: RINRIN
115.character: パンダくんのベッド… パンダくんのパンダクッション

116.speaker: RINRIN
116.character: パンダくんのパンダスリッパ！ パンダくんのシール…
116.definition: Panda's panda slippers! Panda's sticker! This is the present I gave him.

117.speaker: RINRIN
117.character: なんだよ… 大事にしてくれてるじゃん
117.definition: He {\i1}is{\i0} taking good care of it. Baby pandas! They're so cute!

119.speaker: RINRIN
119.character: ダメだよ　それは観賞用だよ
119.definition: No, no, that's for decoration. You're giving it to me?

121.speaker: PANDAMAMA
121.character: お目覚め？　ごめんなさいね
121.definition: Are you awake? Sorry about that. Grandpa's a little... Oh?

122.speaker: RINRIN
122.character: ありがとう！　おいしいな
122.definition: Thank you. It tastes really good.

123.speaker: PANDAMAMA
123.character: リンリン！？　それ　観賞用よ

124.speaker: PANDAMAMA
124.character: っていうか　笹　食べるの？
124.definition: Or rather, do you eat bamboo grass?

125.speaker: RINRIN
125.character: えぇ　状況しだいでは

126.speaker: PANDAMAMA
126.character: まぁ　止めないけど…

127.speaker: PANDAMAMA
127.character: あの…　お花代　まだ お支払いしてなかったでしょ？
127.definition: Um, I haven't paid you for the flowers yet.

128.speaker: RINRIN
128.character: お代はいらないので 仔パンダ　抱っこさせてください！
128.definition: I don't need payment. May I just hold the baby pandas?

129.speaker: PANDAMAMA
129.definition: Sure, but I'll still pay you.

130.speaker: PANDAMAMA
130.character: あら…　ごめんなさい

133.speaker: RINRIN
133.character: お花 こちらで　よろしいでしょうか？

134.speaker: GIRL
134.character: 厘太郎さん　どうしたのかしら？
134.definition: I wonder what happened to Mr. Rintaro?

136.speaker: RINRIN
136.character: パンダママさんや　妹ちゃんとは 仲よくなれたんだ
136.definition: {\a6}I was able to become friends with Panda's mom {\a6}and little sister.

137.speaker: RINRIN
137.character: 今度は　パンダお爺ちゃんと 仔パンダちゃんたち…
137.definition: {\a6}Next is Panda's grandpa and the babies.

139.speaker: PANDA
139.character: ねぇ　ねぇ　半田さん

141.speaker: HANDA
141.character: 今日は　ダメ！　用事あるの
141.definition: Not today. I have plans today.

142.speaker: PANDA
142.character: ちょっとくらい　いいじゃん

143.speaker: PANDA
143.character: 彼女もいないし　暇でしょ？
143.definition: You don't have a girlfriend, so you should be free.

144.speaker: HANDA
144.character: もう…　パンダくんより 女の子に追いかけられたいよ
144.definition: Jeez, I wish girls would follow me instead of you, Panda.

146.speaker: RINRIN
146.character: パンダくんより　だと！？

148.speaker: HANDA
148.character: 何か　視線を感じるんだけど…
148.definition: I feel like someone's staring at me.
